hero.title: In your size
hero.description: Transfer your figure to a virtual space and try on clothes without leaving home

businessHero.title: Business
businessHero.description: Siz3r is an innovative platform supporting online clothing shopping.

block1.title: In your size
block1.description: Download the app. Take a photo. Try on and buy.

image1.title: Download app
image1.description: It only takes a moment to download the app and access all its features!

image2.title: Take a photo
image2.description: It's simple! Based on just one photo, we will be able to collect your measurements and allow you to try on clothes without leaving your home!

image3.title: Try on and buy
image3.description: Congratulations! Now you can buy perfectly fitting clothes without visiting the store!

block2.title: Functionalities
block2.description: Siz3r recommends the best-fitting clothes from sellers thanks to precise 3D models of your figure.

image1.title: 3D Scanning
image1.description: Transform your photos into accurate 3D silhouettes

image2.title: Virtual Fitting Room
image2.description: Use the virtual fitting room to see how different outfits fit you.

image3.title: Clothes Scanning
image3.description: Add clothes to the system and present them on 3D models.

contact.name: Name

block1business.title: Functionalities
block1business.description:
By creating a dimensioned 3D model of the customer's body, Siz3r recommends the best-fitting clothes from the sellers' offer.

Our platform also allows you to visualize the customer in selected outfits in the form of three-dimensional models, which helps you make the right choice.

block2business.title: Industries and applications
block2business.description: Siz3r is used in various industries, such as e-commerce, traditional stores, fitness, dietetics and entertainment. Our solutions help increase competitiveness, reduce costs and reduce the number of product returns.

image1.title: E-commerce
image1.description: Better fit of clothes, reduce returns.

image2.title: Traditional stores
image2.description: Try on clothes without physical contact.

image4.title: Entertainment
image4.description: Personalize avatars in games and virtual worlds.

footer.description: Siz3r is an innovative technological platform supporting clothing purchases on e-commerce platforms.
